pr_title: Filter symbols of nodes added by the parser

timeline.message: Filter symbols of nodes added by the parser

timeline.bodyText: Can we do this check at the symbol enter phase? Then we can use the BLangMissingNodesHelper
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Can do. The concern is whether symbol enter is the only place where a SOURCE symbol can be created.
replies.author: pubudu91

replies.bodyText: I think it would be better to do it within this constructor if we can't ensure Pubudu's concern and this is always the common place
replies.author: nadeeshaan

replies.bodyText:
IMO creator of the symbol should give the proper origin.
Also, having to hardcode "$missingNode$" smells a problem
replies.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Will move it to symbol enter and see. If any issues arise, can address them case by case I guess
replies.author: pubudu91

timeline.message: Move missing node checking logic to symbol enter
Move missing node checking logic to symbol enter
